javax.microedition.io
Class Connector

java.lang.Object
  javax.microedition.io.Connector

public class Connector
extends Object

This class delegated all calls to MicroeditionConnector 1) Solves Bytecode comatibilty problems. Application compiled with bluecove.jar should run on java me platform. 2) Use standard Protocol initialization to enable integration in other environments. vlads changes: Move Original code to MicroeditionConnector
